content: *learn to crochet while you make this cute spring bag yarnspirations * --- *skill level * easy --- **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds or lily® sugar n cream® ombres 56 7 g/2 oz 86 m/95 yds *2 balls* *additional materials * two large beads --- *featured on february 23 & 24 2009 calendar pages * ---
